actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To correct an oversight in earlier legislation by directing the National Park Service to grant to three individuals a right of use and occupancy of certain property on Santa Cruz Island.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to direct the Secretary of the Interior to grant identical rights of use and occupancy of certain property on Santa Cruz Island, California, for 25 years, to a specified previous owner and to each of two identified grantors.

titles.title: To correct an oversight in earlier legislation by directing the National Park Service to grant to three individuals a right of use and occupancy of certain property on Santa Cruz Island.
